#summary How to install ringmap.
#labels Phase-Deploy
<wiki:toc max_depth="2" />

= Requirements =
== Hardware ==
 * Gigabit Ethernet adapters based on the following Intel controller chips:
  * _82540, 82541ER, 82541PI, 82542, 82543, 82544, 82545, 82546, 82546EB, 82546GB, 82547, 82571, 82572 and 82573_

== Software == 
 * FreeBSD-*7.x*, *i386*-Kernel
 * *em* driver for Intel GbE adapters
  * must be [http://www.freebsd.org/doc/en/books/handbook/kernelconfig.html compiled and installed as module]

= Download =
{{{
svn checkout http://ringmap.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ ringmap-read-only
}}}

= Installing ringmap =
 # go to _[http://code.google.com/p/ringmap/source/browse/#svn/trunk/src/FreeBSD_7/scripts scripts/]_ directory 
 # run *ringmap_build_and_load* shell script
  * *ringmap* network driver will build and (kld-)loaded
  * *ringmap*-libpcap will build and be installed

= To uninstall and revert to the original packet capturing stack = 
 # go to _[http://code.google.com/p/ringmap/source/browse/#svn/trunk/src/FreeBSD_7/scripts scripts/]_ directory 
 # run *generic_build_and_load* shell script
  * *generic* network driver and *generic* libpcap will build and be installed
